sections.title: Innovative Web Templates for Every Creator
sections.subtitle: Craft Your Online Presence with Ease
sections.name: HeroSection
sections.label: Home
sections.content: Welcome to Modern Template Solutions, where creativity meets functionality. Discover our range of HTML, CSS, and JS templates designed to elevate your digital projects. Perfect for developers, designers, and businesses who want to stand out online. Experience the future of web design today.

images.name: Main Banner
images.description: A vibrant and modern hero image showcasing artistic website templates.

sections.title: About Modern Template Solutions
sections.subtitle: Our Mission and Vision
sections.name: AboutSection
sections.label: About
sections.content: At Modern Template Solutions, we are passionate about providing cutting-edge templates that empower creators to build stunning websites. Our mission is to bridge the gap between design and functionality, offering seamless experiences for users of all skill levels. Join us on our journey to transform the web, one template at a time.

images.name: About Background
images.description: A creative background image symbolizing innovation and technology.

sections.title: Our Services
sections.subtitle: What We Offer
sections.name: ServicesSection
sections.label: Services
sections.content:
- **Customizable HTML & CSS Templates**: Tailor our templates to suit your unique style and needs.  
- **Interactive JS Components**: Bring your pages to life with our dynamic JavaScript features.  
- **Responsive Design**: Our templates ensure a seamless experience across all devices.  
- **Support & Guidance**: Reliable customer support to help you throughout your design journey.

images.name: Template Showcase
images.description: Images of various customizable website templates.

sections.title: Meet Our Team
sections.subtitle: The Faces Behind Modern Template Solutions
sections.name: TeamSection
sections.label: Team
sections.content: Our team is a diverse group of skilled professionals dedicated to creating outstanding web solutions. We bring together design, development, and customer service expertise to ensure your satisfaction.

sections.title: Pricing Plans
sections.subtitle: Choose Your Plan
sections.name: PricingSection
sections.label: Pricing
sections.content:
- **Starter Plan**: Perfect for personal projects.  
- **Pro Plan**: Ideal for small businesses looking to scale.  
- **Enterprise Plan**: Best for large organizations with complex needs. 

Visit our [pricing page](#) for more details.

images.name: Pricing Plan Graphic

sections.title: Frequently Asked Questions
sections.subtitle: Answers to Common Queries
sections.name: FAQSection
sections.label: FAQ
sections.content:
**Q: Do I need coding skills to use your templates?**  
A: Not necessarily! Our templates are user-friendly, ideal for both beginners and experts.  

**Q: What if I need help with customization?**  
A: We offer customer support to assist you in personalizing your template.

sections.title: Latest News and Updates
sections.subtitle: Stay Informed
sections.name: NewsSection
sections.label: News
sections.content: Learn about our new releases, updates, and company news here. We’re constantly evolving to bring you the best in web design and development solutions.
